data.text: A Yave, ntinu weti yangalala mu zingolo ziaku
Ngeyo wumvana bima bioso bitomba ntimꞌandi.
Niandi wulomba luzingu kuidi ngeyo ayi wumvana luawu,
Nkemboꞌandi widi wunneni mu diambu di ndungunu weti vana.
Bukiedika, ngeyo wumvana lusakumunu lu kalumani ;
Bila Ntinu wuntulanga diana diandi mu Yave ;
Koko kuaku kuela buila bambeni ziaku zioso.
Wela kuba kitula banga mfulu makala ma mbazu,
Ka diambu ko balenda kubika mambimbi mu diambu diaku
A Yave, yayusu kuaku mu zingolo ziaku.
